T02D2297:226b-1: aa bo dha bo dha ka:/
T02D2297:226b-3: ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa /
T02D2297:226b-4: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2297:226b-5: skyon med yon tan rgya mtsho yi //
T02D2297:226b-6: mgon po 'jam dpal la btud nas //
T02D2297:226b-7: ma rtogs rtogs byed de nyid ni //
T02D2297:226b-8: brtse bas bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02D2297:226b-9: 'di na gzhan gyis brtags pa de rtogs pa ni chos kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D2297:226b-10: gzhan gyis brtags pa de gang yin zhe na /
T02D2297:226b-11: bdag brtag pa khyab pa kun du 'gro zhing gzugs can ma yin pa'i gcig pu yod pa'o //
T02D2297:226b-12: bdag brtag pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2297:226b-13: re zhig phung po ni bdag ma yin te /
T02D2297:226b-14: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:226b-15: phung po las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
T02D2297:226b-16: bum pa bzhin tha dad par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:226b-17: de bzhin du yang ji ltar bum pa dang chu
T02D2297:226b-18: bzhin rten dang brten pa'i dngos por yang med de
T02D2297:226b-19: / 'bras dang phol mig ltar phung po dang nye bar gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2297:226b-20: phung po dang 'dul ba yang ma yin te /
T02D2297:226b-21: phung po las phyi rol pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:226b-22: de bzhin du ji ltar lha sbyin pa lang can
T02D2297:226b-23: bzhin phung po dang ldan pa yang ma yin no
T02D2297:226b-24: // 'dir pha rol rgol ba na re bdag med
T02D2297:226b-25: na ni de'i tshe las dang 'bras bu 'brel pa
T02D2297:226b-27: ba lang shi na rva dang rmig pa dang /
T02D2297:226b-28: rnga ma la sogs pa yang ldog par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-0: smras pa 'dir khyad par can gyi dpe nyon cig / nam mkha'o @227a * //
T02D2297:227a-1: zer gyur pa na thag pa la sprul du shas
T02D2297:227a-2: pas sbag pa nyid du gyur nas de ltar mar
T02D2297:227a-3: me khyer te bltas pa'i tshe 'di thag pa yin
T02D2297:227a-4: gyi sbrul ni ma yin no //
T02D2297:227a-5: 'on kyang mi bden par sgro btags pa dang bral
T02D2297:227a-6: lo snyam pa de bzhin du mdar bsdus na gang
T02D2297:227a-9: de lta mod kyi thag pa'i dngos po yod do zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-13: gnyis bsgril ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2297:227a-14: snal ma'i tshogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:227a-15: de yang yod pa ma yin te rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:227a-16: rdul phra rab kyang yod pa ma yin te phyogs
T02D2297:227a-17: cha tha dad pas phyen rdul phra rab kyang tha
T02D2297:227a-18: dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:227a-19: gang la cha shas cha can du gtogs pa de ji ltar rdul phra mor 'gyur /
T02D2297:227a-20: de lta bas na thams cad med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-21: dngos po yod pa ma yin pas //
T02D2297:227a-22: gang zhig med par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2297:227a-23: yod dang med pa'i chos bral bas //
T02D2297:227a-24: yod dang med par bsam du med //
T02D2297:227a-25: 'di dag ni chos bdag med pa'o //
T02D2297:227a-26: de lta na ni skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa ji lta zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-28: thog mar 'byung ba gang yin brjod pa skye ba'o //
T02D2297:227a-30: gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral na gang zhig gis skye ba yin /
T02D2297:227a-31: gal te gnas pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i skye
T02D2297:227a-32: ba de'i tshe rus sbal gyi spu yang skye bar
T02D2297:227a-34: de lta yin mod kyi gnas pa yin no zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-35: skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral nas gang zhig gnas pa yin /
T02D2297:227a-36: gal te skye ba dang 'jig pa med par gnas
T02D2297:227a-37: na de'i tshe mgo bo gnyis dang lag pa gsum
T02D2297:227a-38: po ma skyes pa nyid la yang mthong bar 'gyur
T02D2297:227a-39: ro // 'on te 'jig pa ma yin no zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-40: gal te skye ba dang gnas pa dang bral ba'i
T02D2297:227a-41: 'jig pa yod pa de'i tshe mo gsham gyi bu
T02D2297:227a-42: la yang ji ltar zlog par byed /
T02D2297:227a-43: 'on te cig car du 'jug go zhe na /
T02D2297:227a-45: phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir mun pa dang snang ba bzhin no //
T02D2297:227a-46: 'on te rnam par rig par smra ba na re
T02D2297:227a-47: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni yod do zhe
T02D2297:227a-49: gal te yod pa de'i tshe ngo bo nyid dpyad par bya ste /
T02D2297:227a-50: gcig cig gi rang bzhin yin nam du ma'i rang bzhin yin /
T02D2297:227b-0: re zhig @227b gcig gi rang bzhin ni ma yin te /
T02D2297:227b-1: phyogs cha du mas tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2297:227b-2: gcig gi rang bzhin med na du ma'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2297:227b-3: kha dog gam dbyibs dmigs pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang skye ba'o zhe na /
T02D2297:227b-4: de yang mi 'thad de rang ngam gzhan nam gnyi
T02D2297:227b-5: ga las sam rgyu med par mi rung ba'i phyir
T02D2297:227b-6: ro // de lta na ni gal te thams cad
T02D2297:227b-7: med pa de'i tshe na phyi rol dang nang du
T02D2297:227b-8: snang ba 'di dag ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2297:227b-10: mgal me'i 'khor lo sprul pa dang //
T02D2297:227b-11: rmi lam sgyu ma chu zla dang //
T02D2297:227b-12: sgra brnyan dang ni smig rgyu dang //
T02D2297:227b-13: du ba'i mtshan ma la sogs bzhin //
T02D2297:227b-15: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
T02D2297:227b-16: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
T02D2297:227b-17: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
T02D2297:227b-18: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02D2297:227b-20: dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun //
T02D2297:227b-21: dmigs pa med par rab tu bshang //
T02D2297:227b-22: dmigs pa med pa'i blor byas nas //
T02D2297:227b-23: dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2297:227b-24: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T02D2297:227b-25: bsam gtan la sogs rtag tu brten //
T02D2297:227b-26: dus mi ring ba nyid du ni //
T02D2297:227b-27: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2297:227b-28: ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa slob dpon chen
T02D2297:227b-29: po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
